introduction: Curiosity Original ‘CSI On Trial’ Puts Forensic Science To The Test With Explosive Results.New Docuseries Exposes Flaws in Common Crime Scene Investigation Methods Used in Criminal Cases and Tells the Emotional Stories of the Wrongly Convicted.Filmmaker and series executive producer Molly Hermann from The Biscuit Factory narrates the docuseries. She interviewed nearly 70 scientists, practitioners, attorneys, judges, and innocent people who were convicted by flawed forensic evidence.S1 E1 - Blood Pattern AnalysisS1 E2 - Bite Mark AnalysisS1 E3 - Firearm ExaminationS1 E4 - Shaken Baby SyndromeS1 E5 - Footwear AnalysisS1 E6 - Arson Investigation
